content:
The chunk of code is part of a method that updates the UI elements for point lights or spotlights, setting their attenuation values to display in the editor.

att = l.getAttenuation()
                self.pConstantAttenuation.set(att[0], 0)
                self.pLinearAttenuation.set(att[1], 0)
                self.pQuadraticAttenuation.set(att[2], 0)
